text: IMDb (or Internet Movie Database) is an online database of information (facts) about actors, movies, TV shows, and video games. The IMDb database started in October 1990, moved to the World Wide Web in 1993,"IMDb History". IMDb. and has been owned by Amazon.com since 1998. == References == ==Other websites== * Internet Movie Database (IMDb) website Category:1990 establishments Category:Movie industry Category:Television Category:Video game websites Category:American entertainment websites Category:Amazon (company)
title: Internet Movie Database
